message.content:
cs.GT, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.MA, cs.DS 

The paper introduces a mechanism design problem for allocating resources to agents with uncertain values, which is a classic topic in game theory (cs.GT). The paper also proposes a family of contingent payment mechanisms, which involves designing incentives for agents to use resources efficiently, and this is a common problem in artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also discusses the welfare properties of the mechanisms, which is a topic in machine learning (cs.LG) and multi-agent systems (cs.MA). Finally, the paper presents a simulation study, which involves analyzing data and evaluating the performance of the mechanisms, and this is a topic in data science (cs.DS).
